Articles.Content:
Ok, since we are close to release, it's a good time to ask:

When did our fellow forum dwellers join KSP?

I joined at 0.10 IIRC.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T01:53:48Z" title="02/28/2015 01:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by gmpd2000**
0.23.5, just a week or so before 0.24
23.5 about 2 days after loving the demo.

bought it steam summer sale of '13, couldnt play until that october when I upgraded my video card. turns out my old cards main feature was its "power saving" ability. It was super energy efficient, but was the worst thing ever.

No idea what the version was. It was mid 2013 if I recall correctly. I can't for the life of me remember why I bought it. At first I didn't really get hooked, then after I quit my job and had a little more time I fell completely in love with it.

0.18 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

/10chars
According to my store profile, 05-13-2013.
23.5 is when i joined
I'm a noob so 0.90 was already out.
I joined about a week or so before .23, so late .22.

I joined back in 2012. If I recall correctly, they had released Eeloo just a few days before I bought it.

I'd just had major surgery with about two good weeks of post-op downtime. In fact, I specifically bought ksp to help kill the time.
Just before the Mun was added, 0.11 I think.
Got it shortly after the 0.17 update. Planets ftw ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

0.90 December 2014 Steam sale. 

I had just gotten Elite: Dangerous when somebody I know told me about KSP and insisted it was incredible. It was on sale, so I bought it... and haven't loaded ED since.

Forums or game?

Game 0.17 or thereabouts. Forum, it's on my page.
I started playing around about the same time Kurtjmac did. It's been a while.
July 16, 2011 with version 0.8.4.
i joined the proud KSP community in 0.20 only a couple weeks before 0.21, just enough to witness the old KSC! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Around 0.15
I started right after they added the Mun in 0.12. It took me a while to actually land there.
.17 I think.
Bought 0.17, didn't really get into it until 0.20.

.21 here. 

Stuck on a business trip back to the states. Bought it. Played every hour I was off work. Played all during my red eye back to the UK. The rest is history.

.16! 

10char
